Statement about the difficulty of monitoring, not framing the threat itself.
Factual description of effects and potential future impacts without explicit framing language.
Contains explicit framing cues ('terrible news', 'very worried') from a quoted source.
Factual description of trends and potential future impacts without explicit framing language.
Contains explicit framing cues ('very big impacts') from a quoted source.
Factual reporting of a large number of deaths without explicit framing language.
Factual reporting of susceptibility based on previous events.
Factual description of a risk factor and resulting vulnerability.
Contains explicit framing cues ('devastating') from a quoted source.
Factual reporting of case status (confirmed/suspected).
Factual reporting of observed symptoms.

Contains explicit framing cues ('concerning') from a quoted source.

Factual reporting of initial detection by location and species.
Factual reporting of the scale of impact and affected groups.

Factual statement about case demographics.

Factual reporting of common symptoms.
